Text:
Your file downloaded okey. It is the AVG Free install file.
I used to have AVG before. But now I have Avast Free. Maybe because Avast does not advertise so aggresively for an upgrade.
Bottomline, AVG Free is a very good free antivirus. But there are many challengers.
@lineup7: fine.. If you are using Windows operating system then you can use simple and basic "Microsoft Security Essential" which is free source by Microsoft..
There's a reason why its free...
